notes:
Definitions must be alphabetized in all sections in order to facilitate their lookup by the reader.  It's "impossible" to infer if a term was actually "defined" when its location is random among other terms.

[WK: In general having definitions alphabetized makes sense, but in this particular case the WG decided to keep the current design ("This document contains a collection of a wide variety of DNS-related terms, organized loosely by topic." ]
